org.openimaj.math.statistics.distribution

Interface MultivariateGaussian

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MultivariateDistribution
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMultivariateGaussian, CachingMultivariateGaussian, DiagonalMultivariateGaussian, FullMultivariateGaussian, SphericalMultivariateGaussian

    public interface MultivariateGaussian
extends MultivariateDistribution
    Interface describing a multivariate gaussian distribution
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • getCovariance

        double getCovariance(int row,
                     int column)
        Get a covariance value from the covariance matrix.

        This method is provided for efficiency as not all implementations will store the full matrix, and it would be wasteful to create it each time a value is needed.

        Parameters:
        row - the row of the matrix value to get
        column - the column of the matrix value to get
        Returns:
        the covariance at the given row and column
